name: A Melody From East Berlin
description:
Set in a close replica of East Berlin close to the wall, with a moody art style and atmospheric soundtrack, you play as Anja. After having her guitar smashed by the Soviet police, she bids to escape.

There are multiple branches and ways to breach the wall itself using items and helps from friends, all without raising suspicion from the Stasi, or "Secret Police."

------------------------

This game was made in around 9 days for Historical Game Jam III - the theme being The Cold War. We started out with a large scope until having to sculpt the options down. Our first goal was to capture the oppressive mood in East Berlin, using lighting and SFX. 

------------------------

Thanks for playing, and let us know how it goes in the comments!

Game Design - K.C Dignan, Liam Guthrie

Art - Neryko (Cristina Ruiz)

Sound/Narrative - K.C Dignan

Programming - Liam Guthrie
